title: Elemental Struggle
tagline: in which the Fellowship faces peril on water and earth
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship leaves Tollen after completing business, including spell component purchases and entrusting Adam Gower with various tasks.
Members of the party engage in personal activities, such as Seeker's contemplation and letter writing, Wellby's community reconnection, Kenzo's gardening and storytelling, and Delwath's provisioning.
They travel to Cymea and enter the Edge of Echoes, where they receive a mysterious message and face challenges such as navigating rapids and fighting water elementals.
After overcoming elemental hazards within the ruins, they are greeted by a sophisticated woman speaking Drankorian, who leaves them in the care of her servant Claudio.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship contends with treacherous waters and elemental forces as they delve into the mysterious ruins of the Edge of Echoes.
location: Tollen to Edge of Echoes in Cymea
